content: Hi all, was doing some testing and I noticed that when you ask HAPI for a resource with _summary=text it returns an XHTML fragment instead of a subsetted version of the resource. This happens with both Accept=application/fhir+json and _format=application/fhir+json, on the public R4 test server and the docker image (latest).
Realized I forgot to ask a question in that =). Is there a parameter/header/etc. that can be sent to get a filtered version of the resource back instead?
